subject: Questions/Doubts
description_text:
Hello, I've been eyeing your products for a couple months now since Black
Friday is coming up. Being 100% honest I'm between y'all (Plus X model,
newest one) and Simagic P1000's. Reading/watching reviews I've seen your
customer service is awesome which is a super plus.

I'm located in Puerto Rico so I wanted to ask what are typical delivery
times and shipping costs?
I'm guessing the warranty covers me, so if something needs servicing or
parts I'm good, correct?

Thanks,
Gabriel

conversations.body_text: Hi Gabriel Hernandez,     Yes, the warranty remains valid. Purchases made on the official website come with a two-year warranty. However, shipping to Puerto Rico will incur additional shipping fees. Based on the previous address, the estimated cost is around $35 USD. Please send me your address information and the specific product you need, and I will look into the exact amount required for you.

Address is:
Gabriel Hernandez
B7 Calle A Villa Rosa 2
Guayama, Puerto Rico
00784

Image attached of the product. Didn't see a clutch mount option for
haptics, if there is one I would like to add it.

On Thu, Nov 13, 2025 at 11:48 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Gabriel Hernandez,    The new U-shaped mounting brackets are currently out of stock in our US warehouse and can only be shipped from China. If you require them, an additional $39 shipping fee will apply. If not required, the cost remains $30.

Is there a way to mount the motors to the pedals without the u-shaped ones?
I just want to be abñe to mount all 3 of them. If they are neccesary no
problem.

On Fri, Nov 14, 2025, 1:48 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Gabriel Hernandez,    Certainly. The kit includes the original mount, which can be used as normal.
